author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

In the political pursuit to make Canada India and ensure no human is illegal, our northern neighbors have truly lost their minds.

A Canadian resident has been given a "conditional discharge” after trying to have sex with someone he believed was a minor. However, given the fact that he wants to be a citizen, the judge believes that the morally permissible thing to do is to let him off the hook, as the more evil thing would be to disrupt his immigration hearing.

title: Migrant Gets “Conditional Discharge” For Sex Crimes Because It Would, And We Quote, “Delay His Citizenship”

According to Joy Reid, half the country is part of a cult that would put the president's happiness over their own. This includes “letting their daughters and families be destroyed” and “drowning themselves in Texas.” However, given that there is no evidence to back up such statements, and given that most people are better off under the current administration than the former, she deserves to be mocked into oblivion.

title: Joy Reid Trashes Trump Supporters: "They Will Let Their Families Be Destroyed"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Joe Rogan previously declined to “help Trump” in 2022, saying he had no desire to do so. However, after witnessing what he saw as blatant political persecution against the then-former president, “kangaroo courts” targeting him, and questionable circumstances surrounding the man behind the assassination attempt, Rogan felt he had no choice but to finally interview him.

Rogan said many things pushed him to do the interview, but one huge factor was the legal aspects. He was baffled as to how they went after Trump, turning minor charges into something huge just to make him a felon. He pointed out how the bookkeeping case should’ve been a misdemeanor, but somehow it
title: Joe Rogan Reveals Why He Finally Interviewed Trump in 2024 After Refusing to "Help Him" Earlier

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
For some reason, the left believes it's compassionate to allow degenerate individuals to engage in debauchery in public, despite the impact it has on the rest of the population. Their compassion seems to lie more with those committing crimes and engaging in degeneracy than with the majority of law-abiding citizens. Even though public parks are often places for children and families, Seattle still thought it made them morally superior to let one park become a hub for “public sex and masturbation, indecent exposure, and lewd conduct.” But just because city officials turn a blind eye to this disgusting and deranged behavior doesn’t mean they’re legally or morally in the right. That’s why a judge has now stepped in—because the city failed to meet even the bare minimum in upholding law and order.

A
title: Judge orders progressive city's officials to finally do something about the park where people are publicly fornicating in

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Ken Langone, the founder of Home Depot, was among the business leaders attacking Donald Trump over tariffs. Before that, he had endorsed Nikki Haley for president. Yet all it took was six months into Trump's presidency to start to see actual RESULTS over rhetoric for Langone to say, "Whoops. My bad."

He is singing a different tune now, not only admitting that he made a mistake and that he is sold as Donald Trump, but also, and I quote, "I think he's got a good shot at going down in history as one of our best presidents ever."

title: Top "anti-Trump" business leader sees error of his ways, forced to admit, "I am SOLD on Donald Trump"
